alert.note: Alert for Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 15 at 3:07PM EST until January 17 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Six or more inches of heavy snow possible. Snow may transition to rain before ending. * WHERE...Portions of central New Hampshire and south central and southwest Maine. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Heavy snow may lead to difficult travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snowfall rates of greater than 1 inch per hour will make it difficult for road clearing operations to keep up. As a result, driving conditions may be worse than normal.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
